articles.author: Frank Scheck
articles.title: ‘The Six Triple Eight’ Review: Kerry Washington Commands Tyler Perry’s Rousing World War II Drama for Netflix - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Ebony Obsidian also stars in the inspiring true tale of the all-Black Women's Army Corp unit tasked with sorting millions of letters to and from soldiers on the European front.
articles.content: You wouldn’t think that a true story about a World War II unit that specialized in sorting mail would prove to be particularly arresting. But add the facts that the unit in question, the 6888th Centr… [+4457 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Two European satellites launch on mission to blot out the Sun—for science - Ars Technica
articles.description: This will all happen nearly 40,000 miles above the Earth, so you won’t need your eclipse glasses.
